reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
reviews.name: wrcromwell
reviews.title: The item was a failure, the seller really mad the effort
reviews.review: After two tries and both computers failed i gave up for a refund. The seller really made a good effort to try and help get the computer working and they deserve consideration for that.Bill

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2020
reviews.name: Neko Aura
reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.review: For the price it looked amazing. But I would rather just get a sff optiplex over these or even a wyse.They at least allow some upgrades.All parts on this are soldered on and heat up to uncomfortable state with only a few hours of youtube watching.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
reviews.name: familyreviewer21
reviews.title: Slow
reviews.review: Slow wont even stream cbs live out of the box with nothing else loaded wired or wifi sad

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
reviews.name: Paul Norton
reviews.title: It is a real computer, highly recommended
reviews.review: Used this to make a music server, started up without a hitch. Sounds great, surprisingly competent little computer, faster than the old desktop it replaced without the heat and fan noise. Just make sure it's fit for purpose.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
reviews.name: Rene
reviews.title: Practico y funciona muy bien

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.name: decA440
reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces.
reviews.review: This little pc does the work of a full size and is totally silent. Works great for my zoom conferences and handles everyday computer tasks flawlessly. Perfect pc for limited space or occasional use. Supports all my peripherals and a USB hub.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
reviews.name: DDM
reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Super compact mini computer. This is smaller than my hand but does an excellent job.The computer processes quickly.The picture comes through very clear. It comes with Windows 10.Everything was very easy toSet up and start using.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
reviews.name: Mandy
reviews.title: Good enough for small office tasks!
reviews.review: Worked out of the box, Win 10 activated. this is a very small computer that is perfect for small tasks like browsing the internet, email, etc. We have installed at the workplace, so far the PC has been reliable and runs smoothly for what we're asking of it, better than expected.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
reviews.name: michael kz
reviews.title: I've been playing a super mario emulator for 48 hours straight
reviews.review: Help me!!! im scared to go outside because of the pandemic so i ordered this mini pc to help me play emulator games. I cant sleep and im going crazy, this cant be good for my immune system. But its okay because im playing super mario and 007 goldeneye on my mini pc which doesnt make any noise since it doesnt have a fan. And it still runs smooth! I'm afraid to turn it off, im afraid to turn myself off! i want to keep going so i can reach that infamous 152 stars. I want to mr mario go "woo hoo" when i get 152 in hd due to the hdmi. Ive been using my usable K cups, please follow in different review to to keep myself up. Oh and the best part is the memory is plenty for these small emulators. Awesome computer!
